summary: Frontend-only testing of Progress Icons System. All features working correctly: Progress Icons Gallery section renders at /admin#layouts with 4 themes (Chinese Journey, Chinese Architecture, Celestial Path, Ink & Brush) each having 5 levels. Theme tabs are clickable and render different icon sets. Status Animation dropdown in icon editor shows 44 options including all progress animations. Lottie section shows links to LottieFiles.com and Creattie.com with URL tester. Landing page at '/' renders Mosaic Community layout with cultural navigation icons correctly.
passed_tests: Landing page at '/' renders Mosaic Community layout correctly
Cultural navigation icons display with status indicators (PinPan shows 'En Desarrollo')
Admin panel at /admin#layouts loads Layout Preview & Icons section
Layout cards (Living Grid, Cinematic, Horizon, Mosaic Community) render with preview SVGs
Mosaic Community shows 'Active' badge as current layout
Progress Icon Sets section shows '4 themes with 5 levels each'
Progress Icon Sets section expands on click
Chinese Journey tab renders: Seedling, Bamboo, Lotus, Dragon, Phoenix icons
Chinese Architecture tab renders: Foundation, Pillars, Temple, Pagoda, Palace icons
Celestial Path tab renders: New Moon, Crescent, Half Moon, Full Moon, Golden Sun icons
Ink & Brush tab renders: First Stroke, Characters, Flowing Ink, Seal Script, Masterpiece icons
Size variants preview shows 4 sizes: 16px, 24px, 32px, 48px
All Themes Overview shows compact grid of all 4 themes
Lottie Animations section shows links to LottieFiles.com and Creattie.com
Lottie URL tester input is present with preview area
Custom Statuses section shows '21 statuses'
Icon editor opens for Mosaic Community with 6 navigation icons
Status Animation dropdown has 44 options
Progress animation options present in dropdown (Seedling, Bamboo, Lotus, Dragon, Phoenix, Foundation, Pillars, Temple, Pagoda, Palace, New Moon, Full Moon, Golden Sun, etc.)
Lottie Animation (URL) option present in Status Animation dropdown
How-to-use info sections present in Progress Icons Gallery
context_for_next_testing_agent: Progress Icons System is complete and working. Key paths: Admin panel at /admin#layouts shows Layout Preview & Icons, Custom Statuses (21 statuses), and Progress Icon Sets (4 themes Ã— 5 levels = 20 progress icons). The Status Animation dropdown in icon editor has 44 total options including all progress animations (progress_journey_starting, progress_architecture_advancing, etc.) plus Lottie Animation (URL) option. Lottie animations are supported via lottie-react library with sources from LottieFiles.com and Creattie.com. The landing page at '/' uses Mosaic Community layout with cultural navigation icons that can have status animations assigned.
